content: It is raining today. So,Peppa and George cannot play outside.
cn: 今天外面下雨了，所以佩奇和乔治不能在外面玩。

content: Daddy,it's stopped raining. Can we go out to play?
cn: 爸爸，现在雨停了，我们能出去玩了吗？

content: All right,run along you two.
cn: 好的，你们两去玩吧。

content: Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 佩奇最喜欢在泥坑里玩。

content: I love muddy puddles.
cn: 我最喜欢在泥坑里玩了。

content: Peppa.If you jump in muddy puddles,you must wear your boots.
cn: 佩奇，如果你要在泥坑里跳，你必须得穿上靴子才行。

content: Sorry,Mummy.
cn: 对不起，妈妈

content: George likes to jump in muddy puddles,too.
cn: 乔治也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

content: George,If you jump in muddy puddles,you must wear your boots.
cn: 我说乔治，如果你要在泥坑里跳，你必须得穿上靴子才行。

content: Peppa likes to look after her little brother,George.
cn: 佩奇喜欢照顾她的弟弟乔治。

content: George,let's find some more puddles.
cn: 好了，乔治，我们再去找几个泥坑跳吧。

content: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
cn: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

content: Peppa has found a little puddle.
cn: 佩奇找到一个小泥坑。

content: George has found a big puddle.
cn: 乔治找到一个大泥坑。

content: Look,George.There's a really big puddle.
cn: 你看，乔治，那里有个很大的泥坑。

content: George wants to jump into the big puddle first.
cn: 乔治想第一个跳到泥坑里去玩。

content: Stop,George.
cn: 等一下，乔治。

content: I must check if it's safe for you. Good. It is safe for you. Sorry,George. It's only mud.
cn: 我得先检查一下这里安不安全。很好，你可以放心地玩了。对不起，乔治，只是些泥而已。

content: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

content: Come on,George. Let's go and show Daddy.
cn: 来吧，乔治。我们快点去给爸爸看看吧。

content: Goodness me.
cn: 我的老天啊。

content: Daddy.Daddy. Guess what we've been doing.
cn: 爸爸，爸爸，你猜猜我们刚才干什么了。

content: Let me think... Have you been watching television?
cn: 让我猜一猜，你们刚才看电视了？

content: No.No.Daddy.
cn: 不对，你猜错了。

content: Have you just had a bath?
cn: 你们刚才洗澡了？

content: No.No.
cn: 不对，不对。

content: I know. You've been jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 我知道了，你们刚才在泥坑里跳来跳去。

content: Yes.Yes.Daddy. We've been jumping in muddy puddles.
cn: 没错，没错，爸爸。我们在坭坑里跳来跳去。

content: Ho.Ho. And look at the mess you're in.
cn: 看看你们弄得多脏。

content: Oooh...
cn: 糟糕。

content: Oh,well,it's only mud. Let's clean up quickly before Mummy sees the mess.
cn: 哦，没事。只是些泥而已。快清理干净，别让妈妈看到你们这么脏。

content: Daddy,when we've cleaned up,will you and Mummy come and play,too?
cn: 爸爸，我们清理干净之后，你和妈妈也会一起来玩吗？

content: Yes,we can all play in the garden.
cn: 是的，我们都可以在花园玩。

content: Peppa and George are wearing their boots.
cn: 佩奇和乔治穿着他们的靴子。

content: Mummy and Daddy are wearing their boots.
cn: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸也穿着他们的靴子。

content: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

content: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

content: Oh. Daddy pig,look at the mess you're in.
cn: 哦，看啊，猪爸爸，瞧瞧你的身上多脏啊。

content: It's only mud.
cn: 只是些泥而已啦。
